title: 04/05 Fantasy Football Podcast: Cooks Trade; Mock Draft With Rookies
description:
Before we discuss our latest mock draft we go through the winners and losers of the Brandin Cooks trade (2:42). Chris Hogan's stock is clearly up, and is Cooks the best LAR WR? ... Getting into our 12-team standard scoring mock draft (15:00) with Alvin Kamara being drafted a little too early. We'll thoroughly review the first four rounds ... Also check out when the rookies and noteworthy free agents were drafted (45:03) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
